column4: ..and something more serious: flash player doesn't work. 11.04 clean install, and also 11.10 on another hard disk yesterday.
if all you do is watch youtube gnash works
what kind of iso is that?

i'm using the same hardware with two different distros right now. As you imagine, the system behaves differenty. And i think of all that hardware someones needs to cover to catch up since, those companies we do pay too for their hardware, don't have an interest... oh well...
